abstract: The EyeTV Hybrid brings both digital and analog TV to Apple devices, and can make the Mac into a digital video recorder.
snippet: The EyeTV Hybrid brings both digital and analog TV to Apple devices, and can make the Mac into a digital video recorder.
lead_paragraph: There has been a lot of chatter and nearly as much activity around turning computers into entertainment centers. Windows machines get the bulk of the attention (naturally), but now there is a device to bring TV magic to Mac devices. Elgato Systems, a maker of TV software for Macs, has created the EyeTV Hybrid, which the company says “turns your Mac into the world’s most affordable flat-screen HDTV.”

headline.main: With Help From a Software Maker, a Mac Gets a Chance to Break Into TV
headline.print_headline: With Help From a Software Maker, a Mac Gets a Chance to Break Into TV
